parameters.content:
=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

# 🚀 **Pizza Deal Finder Automation – Breakdown** This workflow automatically **scrapes Uber Eats for pizza deals**, **extracts the names and discounts**, and **emails the best offers** to you — all without writing any complex code! --- ## 🟢 **SECTION 1: 🔁 Trigger & 🌍 Fetch Pizza Deals Page** ### 🔹 Nodes Included: 1. ⚡ **Trigger Workflow** 2. 🌐 **Fetch Uber Eats Search Page (Bright Data)** --- ### 🔧 What Happens Here: * **⚡ Trigger Workflow**: This node is the starting point. You can configure it to run: * On-demand (when you click "Execute") * On a schedule (e.g., every morning or every 4 hours) * **🌐 Fetch Uber Eats Search Page**: * Sends a `POST` request to **Bright Data’s Web Unlocker API** to access UberEats. * It bypasses JavaScript-heavy pages and bot protections. * URL targeted: something like `https://www.ubereats.com/search?query=pizza` * Returns full HTML of the results page with all pizza restaurant names and their deals. ### 👨‍💻 For Beginners: * This is the **scraping engine** of your workflow. * Bright Data does the heavy lifting (proxying, unblocking, rendering). * You only need to provide your **Bright Data API key** and the target URL. --- ## 🟡 **SECTION 2: 🧹 Extract Pizza Names & Deals** ### 🔹 Node Included: * 🧩 **Extract Names & Deals** --- ### 🔧 What Happens Here: * This is the **HTML Extract** node. * It scans the raw HTML from the previous step and pulls: * 🏷️ Restaurant names (e.g., “Domino’s”) * 💸 Deals or special offers (e.g., “Free Item on \$9 Spend”) ### 🛠️ CSS Selectors Used: * **Name Selector**: `div.be.f3.bg.f2.ck.bp.bn.k2` → extracts all names * **Deal Selector**: `div.hr.bn.k2` → extracts all visible deals ⚙️ You configure it to **get all matches**, not just one. This ensures multiple restaurants are included. ### 👨‍💻 For Beginners: * This is where **the magic happens** — HTML becomes readable data. * No coding is required — just CSS selectors you can get from “Inspect Element” in Chrome. * You can reuse this for other platforms like DoorDash or Grubhub by updating the selectors. --- ## 🔴 **SECTION 3: 📧 Send Best Deals via Gmail** ### 🔹 Node Included: * ✉️ **Send Pizza Deals via Gmail** --- ### 🔧 What Happens Here: * Sends you an email (or to any recipient you define). * The email includes: * 🧾 List of pizza restaurants * 🎁 Associated deals 📬 You can customize the subject and message format using simple templates: ```html

🍕 Today’s Top Pizza Deals

    {{#each items}}
  • {{this.title}} — {{this.deal}}
    • {{/each}}
``` ### 👨‍💻 For Beginners: * This turns your data into a **daily email alert**. * You can plug in **Gmail, Outlook, Telegram, Slack**, etc. * Use this to stay updated or forward to your group of friends or a Discord bot. --- ## ✨ Final Thoughts | ✅ Feature | 💡 Benefit | | ---------------------------- | --------------------------------------- | | Fully visual | No coding knowledge needed | | Web Unlocker via Bright Data | Access any site without getting blocked | | HTML Extraction | Pull exactly what you need | | Email Integration | Automatically get results | This is a **production-grade workflow** that’s easy to understand, scalable, and customizable for other food types, locations, or platforms. ---

nodes.name: Fetch Uber Eats Search Page (Bright Data)

values.cssSelector: Domino's

parameters.subject: =Best Pizza Deals Near You Today!

parameters.content:
## 🟢 **SECTION 1: 🔁 Trigger & 🌍 Fetch Pizza Deals Page**

### 🔹 Nodes Included:

1. ⚡ **Trigger Workflow**
2. 🌐 **Fetch Uber Eats Search Page (Bright Data)**

---

### 🔧 What Happens Here:

* **⚡ Trigger Workflow**: This node is the starting point. You can configure it to run:

  * On-demand (when you click "Execute")
  * On a schedule (e.g., every morning or every 4 hours)

* **🌐 Fetch Uber Eats Search Page**:

  * Sends a `POST` request to **Bright Data’s Web Unlocker API** to access UberEats.
  * It bypasses JavaScript-heavy pages and bot protections.
  * URL targeted: something like `https://www.ubereats.com/search?query=pizza`
  * Returns full HTML of the results page with all pizza restaurant names and their deals.

### 👨‍💻 For Beginners:

* This is the **scraping engine** of your workflow.
* Bright Data does the heavy lifting (proxying, unblocking, rendering).
* You only need to provide your **Bright Data API key** and the target URL.

---

## 🟡 **SECTION 2: 🧹 Extract Pizza Names & Deals**

### 🔹 Node Included:

* 🧩 **Extract Names & Deals**

---

### 🔧 What Happens Here:

* This is the **HTML Extract** node.
* It scans the raw HTML from the previous step and pulls:

  * 🏷️ Restaurant names (e.g., “Domino’s”)
  * 💸 Deals or special offers (e.g., “Free Item on \$9 Spend”)

### 🛠️ CSS Selectors Used:

* **Name Selector**: `div.be.f3.bg.f2.ck.bp.bn.k2` → extracts all names
* **Deal Selector**: `div.hr.bn.k2` → extracts all visible deals

⚙️ You configure it to **get all matches**, not just one. This ensures multiple restaurants are included.

### 👨‍💻 For Beginners:

* This is where **the magic happens** — HTML becomes readable data.
* No coding is required — just CSS selectors you can get from “Inspect Element” in Chrome.
* You can reuse this for other platforms like DoorDash or Grubhub by updating the selectors.

---

## 🔴 **SECTION 3: 📧 Send Best Deals via Gmail** ### 🔹 Node Included: * ✉️ **Send Pizza Deals via Gmail** --- ### 🔧 What Happens Here: * Sends you an email (or to any recipient you define). * The email includes: * 🧾 List of pizza restaurants * 🎁 Associated deals 📬 You can customize the subject and message format using simple templates: ```html

🍕 Today’s Top Pizza Deals

    {{#each items}}
  • {{this.title}} — {{this.deal}}
    • {{/each}}
```

## I’ll receive a tiny commission if you join Bright Data through this link—thanks for fueling more free content!

### https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25
